amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to add the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency and the Council on Environmental Quality to the list of officials to be consulted in the Compensatory Production Increase Plan.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to add the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency and the Council on Environmental Quality to the list of officials to be consulted in the Compensatory Production Increase Plan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tlaib amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 220 (Roll no. 37).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Ms. Tlaib.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tlaib amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 220 (Roll no. 37).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
